mapper.sql: id, dealer_code, dealer_name, union_id,open_id, order_no, company_no, channel_no, channel_name, channel_order_no, channel_customer_no, channel_type, shop_code, wx_pay_trade_no, total_amount, actual_amount, pay_type, order_time, status, memo, id_card, idcard_pic_front, idcard_pic_reverse, source, freight, freight_agent, gmt_modify, gmt_create, is_del, modifier, creator
mapper.select:
SELECT T2.id,T2.company_id AS companyId,T2.order_no as orderNo,T2.erp_no as erpNo,T2.sku_id as skuId,T2.sku_code as skuCode,T2.upc,T2.item_name as itemName,T2.stock_status as stockStatus,T2.color,T2.scale,T2.third_sku_code as thirdSkuCode, T2.receiver,T2.telephone,T2.postcode,T2.remark,T2.address_detail as addressDetail,T2.receiver_state AS receiverState,T2.receiver_city As receiverCity,T2.receiver_district as receiverDistrict,T2.id_card as idCard, T2.sale_price AS salePrice,T2.weight,T2.quantity,T2.warehouse_id as warehouseId,T4.category_name AS categoryName,T4.brand,T3.name as warehouseName ,T2.order_time as orderTime,T2.sku_pic as skuPic,T2.logistic_type as logisticType , T2.item_id as itemId FROM mall_order T2 LEFT JOIN warehouse T3 ON T2.warehouse_id=T3.id LEFT JOIN item T4 ON T2.item_id=T4.id WHERE T2.id IN
#{item}

SELECT
FROM `mall_order` T1 WHERE T1.stock_status in (0,1,2,9) and status = 0
and T1.sku_id = #{skuId}
ORDER BY T1.id

SELECT
FROM `mall_order` T1 WHERE T1.stock_status in (2, 3, 4) and status = 0
and T1.sku_id = #{skuId}
ORDER BY T1.id

SELECT
FROM mall_order where is_del is false and status = #{status} and gmt_create < date_sub(now(), interval #{timeOut} MINUTE )
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_sub_order SET upc=#{upc} WHERE (upc!=#{upc} or upc is null) and sku_code=#{skuCode}
UPDATE mall_sub_order SET upc=#{upc} WHERE (upc!=#{upc} or upc is null) and sku_code=#{skuCode}

update mall_order set dealer_code = #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_name = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_no = #{companyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_order_no = #{channelOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_customer_no = #{channelCustomerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_code = #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_pay_trade_no = #{wxPayTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_pic_front = #{idcardPicFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_pic_reverse = #{idcardPicReverse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=BIGINT}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, freight_agent = #{freightAgent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select group_concat(CONCAT(position_no, ':', booked)) from inventory_record t where t.erp_order_id=#{erpOrderId}

SELECT
FROM `mall_order` WHERE status = #{status}

SELECT
FROM `mall_order` WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT
FROM mall_order WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT
FROM `mall_order` T1
1=1 AND T1.status IN
#{status}

SELECT
FROM
T1 WHERE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
T1 WHERE

SELECT
FROM
T1 WHERE
ORDER BY T1.id desc
mapper.sql: T1.order_no AS orderNo, T1.channel_order_no AS channelOrderNo, T1.shop_code AS shopCode, T1.order_time AS orderTime, T1.status AS status, T1.memo AS remark, T1.total_amount AS totalAmount, T1.actual_amount AS actualAmount, T1.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, T1.gmt_modify AS gmtModify, T1.pay_type AS payType, T2.receiver AS receiver, T2.receiver_country AS receiverCountry, T2.receiver_state AS receiverState, T2.receiver_city AS receiverCity, T2.receiver_district AS receiverDistrict, T2.receiver_address AS addressDetail, T2.telephone AS telephone, T2.id_card AS idCard
